roleset.name: to collect bit by bit

example.name: passive
example.text: This information was gleaned [*]from your own news stories on the region .
example.arg: [*]from your own news stories on the region

example.name: active, all args
example.text: From a lifetime of undisciplined reading with innocent pencil in hand and malice prepense in mind , I have gleaned a harvest of what I am pleased to denominate Red Pants items , a sampling of which follows .
example.arg: From a lifetime of undisciplined reading with innocent pencil in hand and malice prepense in mind
harvest of what I am pleased to denominate Red Pants items , a sampling of which follows

roleset.note: GLEAN-V NOTES: Based on survey of sentences in WSJ. Member of VNcls learn-14-2. (from glean.01-v)
